adrFormatAddress: 43 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10003-8691, USA

originalText.text:
There are not enough superlatives to describe the great service and respect that our family received from the Provenzano-Lanza funeral home, when viewing and burying our mother, Carmen Davila.
Every detail was meticulously checked and double-checked to ensure that the viewing, the prayer cards, and the overall service lacked nothing - everyone and everything was fantastic!!!

Thank you!!!

text.text:

originalText.text: Amazing service. The entire staff was utmost compassionate, willing to listen and allow us to organize the memorial service just the way we wanted. Responded really fast to all of your needs. Offered us the service of a kind reverend that was keen to the description of our beloved lost one. Provided a phenomenal portrait that looked like a heavenly painting. We are very thankful!

text.text: Amazing service. The entire staff was utmost compassionate, willing to listen and allow us to organize the memorial service just the way we wanted. Responded really fast to all of your needs. Offered us the service of a kind reverend that was keen to the description of our beloved lost one. Provided a phenomenal portrait that looked like a heavenly painting. We are very thankful!

originalText.text: I don't usually write reviews, but I felt this one was necessary. I had to make funeral arrangements when my mother passed away and to say it was stressful is an understatement. However, Michael Lanza, from Provenzano Lanza Funeral home, put me at ease the minute he started to handle all the arrangements. First, the funeral home itself is beautifully renovated! I loved that my mom was surrounded by elegance...I'm sure she approved. Michael and Ron were knowledgeable, but they were also compassionate, kind, patient and understanding. I will never forget how they treated me like family!!! I would HIGHLY recommend.

I will never forget how they treated me like family!!! I would HIGHLY recommend.

originalText.text: We recently had a beloved family member pass and held the service at Provenzano Lanza. Each step along with way from passing to service was directed with respect and compassion whether it was Ron, Matthew or Michael we spoke with. They’re professionalism allowed us to focus on the mourning of the life we lost and for that we are grateful.

text.text: We recently had a beloved family member pass and held the service at Provenzano Lanza. Each step along with way from passing to service was directed with respect and compassion whether it was Ron, Matthew or Michael we spoke with. They’re professionalism allowed us to focus on the mourning of the life we lost and for that we are grateful.

originalText.text: Ron, the transport team and staff at Provenzano where amazing to work with during a difficult time. My abuela was treated with respect and dignity the moment she was transported from her home to the mortuary and given back to us. Any questions or concerns myself or my family had were address which put us all at ease. From start to finish, everything was handled in a timely manner. I would highly recommend this funeral home and I appreciate everything they did for my family! Thank you so much!
